description: Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that enables teams to collaborate in real-time on user interface and user experience projects.
name: figma
title: Figma

triggers.description: Triggers when new comment is posted.
triggers.name: newComment

properties.description: The name of the file that was updated.
properties.name: file_name

properties.description: The UTC ISO 8601 time at which the comment was left.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: ID of the comment.
properties.name: comment_id

properties.description: The user that made the comment and triggered this event.
properties.name: triggered_by

properties.description: ID of the user who triggered the event.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Name of the user who triggered the event.
properties.name: handle

properties.description: Email associated with the user's account.
properties.name: email

properties.description: URL link to the user's profile image.
properties.name: img_url

properties.description: The key of the file that was updated.
properties.name: file_key

properties.description: Number of times the event has been retried.
properties.name: retries

properties.description: Type of the event.
properties.name: event_type

properties.description: The id of the webhook that caused the callback.
properties.name: webhook_id

properties.description: If present, the id of the comment to which this is the reply.
properties.name: parent_id

properties.description: If set, the UTC ISO 8601 time the comment was resolved.
properties.name: resolved_at

properties.description: Users that were mentioned in the comment.
ID of the user.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Name of the user.
properties.name: handle

properties.description: Email associated with the user's account.
properties.name: email

properties.description: URL link to the user's profile image.
properties.name: img_url
mentions

properties.description: Contents of the comment itself.
Text of the comment.
properties.name: text

properties.description: User id that is set if a fragment refers to a user mention.
properties.name: mention
comment

properties.name: order_id

properties.description: The passcode specified when the webhook was created, should match what was initially provided.

properties.description: UTC ISO 8601 timestamp of when the event was triggered.
properties.name: timestamp
